name: Robinquill Terra

ability.name: Hawk Eye
ability.description: While fighting together, allows you to deal more damage to weak points.

description: A Pal that lives a hunting life in rocky areas and is very close to humans. When bones are found in ruins, there are always human bones found nearby as well.

skills.name: Sand Blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: Wind Cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Focus Shot
skills.description: Robinquill's exclusive skill. Takes aim while drawing its bow before loosing a powerful shot at an enemy.

skills.name: Stone Blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: Sand Tornado
skills.description: Generates two sand tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Solar Blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.

skills.name: Rock Lance
skills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.
